[@microsoft/fast-foundation](./fast-foundation.md) &gt; [TooltipPosition](./fast-foundation.tooltipposition.md)

## TooltipPosition variable

Enumerates possible tooltip positions

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
TooltipPosition: {
    readonly top: "top";
    readonly right: "right";
    readonly bottom: "bottom";
    readonly left: "left";
    readonly start: "start";
    readonly end: "end";
    readonly topLeft: "top-left";
    readonly topRight: "top-right";
    readonly bottomLeft: "bottom-left";
    readonly bottomRight: "bottom-right";
    readonly topStart: "top-start";
    readonly topEnd: "top-end";
    readonly bottomStart: "bottom-start";
    readonly bottomEnd: "bottom-end";
}
```
